Package model

Class GamePlayers

java.lang.Object
model.GamePlayers
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ai, Player
public class GamePlayers extends Object
This class represents the players of the game. We have two players: the human player and the computer player. This class will be used in order for the player and the AI to inherit from it.
Author:
kelvin.likollari@usi.ch
